mapper.select: SELECT id AS id, parter_id AS parterId, name AS name, phone_number AS phoneNumber, age AS age, sex AS sex, address AS address, industry AS industry, remark AS remark FROM partner_info WHERE parter_id = #{parterId} AND effective = '1'

SELECT A.parter_id AS partnerId, A.name AS partnerName, A.phone_number AS phoneNumber, A.community_id AS communityId, A.longitude AS longitude, A.latitude AS latitude FROM partner_info A INNER JOIN community B ON A.community_id = B.id
WHERE B.community_name = #{communityName}
